# Inflict Critical Damage (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Construct touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Eberron Campaign Setting (WotC), pg. 112

As *[[Inflict Light Damage (Spell)|inflict light damage]]**,* except *inflict critical damage* deals 4d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +20).
